property.name: appId
property.label: Qlik App ID
property.description: The ID of the Qlik application. Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: objectId
property.label: Qlik Object ID
property.description: The ID of the Qlik object to display

property.name: host
property.label: Qlik Host
property.description: The Qlik Cloud tenant URL. Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: webIntegrationId
property.label: Web Integration ID
property.description: The Qlik Web Integration ID for authentication. Leave empty to use QlikConfig__mdt.

property.name: height
property.label: Height
property.description: Height of the Qlik embed container (e.g., 400px, 50vh)

property.name: ui
property.label: UI Type
property.description: Type of Qlik UI to display

property.name: theme
property.label: Theme
property.description: Theme for the Qlik visualization (light or dark)
